text: FYI, here is an update for the COP squad

Complete:
1.	cop server init
2.	cop server start
3.	cop client register
4.	cop client enroll

In Review:
1.	DB support (sqllite, mysql, postgres)
2.	Clustering tested with haproxy sprayer & postgres
3.	cop client reenroll (in review)
4.	cop client revoke (part 1 in review)
See <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/2843/>
5.	Improved user management abstraction (for LDAP next)

In Progress:
1.	tcerts – beginning review
TODO: BCCSP integration for HSM support
2.	CLI improvement
See <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-1170>
3.	docker compose for COP cluster (Latitia) & integrate to CI (Ramesh)
4.	Extend certificate table schema with enrollment ID to enable cop client revoke (part 2) – that is, to find all certificates for a particular user so that can be revoked
5.	BCCSP enable CFSSL for HSM support


Next
•	LDAP
See <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-1144>
•	Audit
See <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-1228>
•	Cop ledger commands
